mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, name, password, company_id, work_space_id, manager_id, arrive_date, leave_date, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workSpaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leaveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update employee set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_space_id = #{workSpaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_date = #{arriveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leave_date = #{leaveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, company_id, work_space_id, manager_id, arrive_date, leave_date, create_date, update_date from employee where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, name, password, company_id, work_space_id, manager_id, arrive_date, leave_date, create_date, update_date from employee
